website_summaries.verdict: This mask contains 10% sulfur, which cleans out pores, clears up cystic acne, and absorbs excess oil.
pros: Purifying kaolin and bentonite clays combine with sulfur
Can clear skin of acne within days
Also effective as spot treatment or overnight mask
Simultaneously exfoliates, absorbs excess oils, purifies pores, and soothes
cons: Some users complain of a strong smell

website_summaries.verdict: Choose this product if you're looking for an alternative to peel-off masks or have delicate skin, but it might take longer than others to deliver noticeable results.
pros: Formulated with mineral Dead Sea mud plus natural ingredients that soften skin and help eliminate blackheads and other skin blemishes over time
No peeling, so delicate on sensitive skin
cons: Might not work for major breakouts

customer_reviews.title: The ingredients listed on the product label do not match ...
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients listed on the product label do not match the product description on Amazon. The first three ingredients, in order, are potato starch, water, corn starch. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Makes my face feel so smooth
customer_reviews.text: First thing , I do have very sensitive skin and my face will burn if something is too harsh and I didn't have an issue with this at all. Second it really works,my hyper pigmentation on my chin has lightened. My skin is super soft and my dark marks are fading away !
customer_reviews.author: shay

customer_reviews.title: No Longer Pure or Natural
customer_reviews.text: I used to LOVE this product when it really was "pure" and "natural." The ingredients have changed dramatically in the last year, making the top ingredients potato and corn starches. Gross. Thanks but no thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Not too crazy about this one.
customer_reviews.text: I was always skeptical about purchasing such items on Amazon mostly because you really dont know what's truly in the product. Anyone can make a label. I've used this mud mask several times and have seen 0 results. Plus it's really annoying having to clean your face after the shower because after you wipe you'll always find a shade of grayness on the towel. The label wasn't on straight either..maybe it isn't skepticism after all!!
customer_reviews.author: marta

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I know a lot of people who love dead Sea masks, but for me, my face completely broke out in blackheads the next day after a single use. I ended up giving it to my sister in law, who hasn't had any issues with it, but i will not be buying it again for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Boggioni

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about masks, but I really like this stuff. I use it about once a week and it makes my skin feel soft and rejuvenated. I give it 4 stars instead of 5 because I'm not really sure if it actually does anything regarding acne or scars, but my skin does feel really good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different formula
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been ordering this stuff since highschool and I absolutely love it. HOWEVER, my most recent purchase, the color is a lighter gray, is beyond incredibly fragrant all of a sudden and whatever this *new* formula is has not cleared my skin at all. I’m 22 and started using at 15 and whenever I would have one spot of acne,I would do a mud mask and boom, gone overnight. This new formula does absolutely NOTHING for my skin, at all. Incredibly disappointing I’ll need to find a new brand after being so reliant on Purebody the last 7 or 8 YEARS.
customer_reviews.author: adelaide

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I used this mask and my boyfriend did too. It left our skin feeling cleaner and moisturized but we didn't see any drastic results after using this twice. We're hoping to see good things happen. The only reason I didn't give this 5 stars is because after rinsing it off, I used my toner and it picked up a lot of clay. I recommend using before going in the shower to make sure it gets rinsed off completely.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Exacerbates Acne and Non-Refundable
customer_reviews.text: The product advertises on the container to "help clear acne" when it actually intensified my acne even more. It also takes more than 15 minutes to dry, even with a thin, translucent layer. It didn't finish drying after 30 minutes in fact and when I washed it off, I saw that what acne I had before had turned even more red and smaller acne bumps had formed on my cheeks. Also, I should mention that it gives off a light cologne smell similar to the smell of Abercrombie stores. It makes me sick. I'm really disappointed. Buyers beware that this product is non-returnable and non-refundable as well.
customer_reviews.author: J17

customer_reviews.title: almost expired, no returns
customer_reviews.text: We bought this face mask, and I thought it would be good, since it is "Amazon's choice", but this product did not meet the standards. It was packed in 2017 and expires in about a month. We are reluctant to use it in fear of having skin problems, and even if we used it, it would be expired long before we even get close to finish using it. We wanted to return it and order a different face mask, but it is not eligible for return! Horrible, will not buy again and does not recommend others to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin look great!
customer_reviews.text: I saw the reviews and thought I'd give this a try. I'm so glad I did! My skin looks amazing after I use it. I usually use at least once a week. I put it on and keep it on while I do things around the house. I've left it on for an hour with no adverse reaction. The I shower to get it off as it is black and all of my washcloths are white so, just to avoid staining them, I shower it off. I loved this so much I bought one for all of my girlfriends for Chrustmas.
customer_reviews.author: TryAnythingOnce

customer_reviews.title: Expired product
customer_reviews.text: They sent me an expired product!!! Expired on March 2019. I purchased it on June 2020! And it is nonreturnable so I can’t even use it!
customer_reviews.author: Bilgecan

customer_reviews.title: It smells great and leaves skin feeling amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! Smells good and leaves skin leaving soft and tight! You can feel what it's done to your skin after washing off after 15 mins. It doesn't have a burning feeling but you can sort of feel your pores been cleaned up. Might feel a little tingle when washed off but it doesn't leave face feeling like it's been peeled. Dont over use! It will leave your face feeling like it did get peeled lolol
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients changed
customer_reviews.text: This product is no longer what it used to be. Originally, it was a very short list of ingredients, with actual mud being the first item. Now it's primarily potato starch.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this messy stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My skin feels great after using it. I will mention that it takes closer to 30 minutes for this product to dry on my cheeks, everywhere else on my face takes 15 minutes. Weird, right? I don't apply a thick layer. Since you have to "rub" this off, I recommend taking it off while standing in the shower with the water off (otherwise your hands just get wet and re-activate the muddy consistency). Then take your normal shower. This product can be messy, but rinses with water just fine.
customer_reviews.author: fenix

customer_reviews.title: Made My Chocolate Skin Glow!
customer_reviews.text: I gently washed my face before applying, and left it on for about 20 minutes or so. No burning or weird smell, the consistency is very thick but absorbs and spreads very easily. A little goes a long way and I see why the instructions say no more than onc a week, this stuff can easil dry out your skin. But after one use I'm truly impressed my skin looked and felt smooth, and actually had a glow! My bf could even notice a difference! I think this product should last about 4-6 months give or take your application process.
customer_reviews.author: VooDooLove

customer_reviews.title: It made my eczema worse and did not help my acne at all
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work for me since I read many positive comments. I wanted this product to help my acne and eczema. However, it hasn't helped either problem. It made my eczema worse and did not help my acne at all. I wish it would have helped because I didn't care how much it cost, I just wanted positive results.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the product! I've only tried it once last night. & today I woke up with my face feeling amazing. as soft as a baby's bottom! I had two buy this item twice. my first time I bought it, tried to take it to Florida with me, and got tossed out. since they consider it like a liquid. I like the packaging more the first time, as it was glass. this time it was just plastic, and not the hard plastic either.. and the labels weren't stuck on there that well there's quite a bit of bubbles. other than the packaging. the product itself is amazing and I will be looking to purchase more pure body natural products.
customer_reviews.author: MADEBYMC

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this mask
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this mask: it smells wonderful and my skin is so soft and moist when I wash the mask off, even before I put moisturizer on. I had some breakouts on my forehead for a couple of weeks and after using this every other night for a week I can see my skin clearing up. I also love the soft gray color! As long as the product stays the same I will be a lifetime user.
customer_reviews.author: Nixnami

customer_reviews.title: Ingredient is not right. It is not for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for quite awhile. It just not for me. The smile is gross and do not make my skin feel smooth at all. Never buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Alright, so I purchased this mask a couple months ...
customer_reviews.text: Alright, so I purchased this mask a couple months ago, and am definitely seeing results. My skin feels clean, less exhausted, and actually fresh after washing this mask off! However, the reason why I took away one star is because the blackheads on my nose are still there. Of course, the pores appear smaller, but the blackheads are still there, which is frustrating. (account owner's daughter)
customer_reviews.author: Andrey

customer_reviews.title: It has successfully taken away all of my acne! ...
customer_reviews.text: It has successfully taken away all of my acne! I am now working on all my scars and toning. I have used it once a week for 6 weeks and my face is acne free. I use it to keep my skin clear and fade dark marks and scars, which I have already seen a difference. I apply it after my shower, let it dry for 15 minutes then wash it off with mark water, pat skin dry then apply some face cream. This routine has done wonders for me! I can now go out without makeup with complete confidence. My skin is very sensitive and this has been the only routine that didn't cause problems with my eczema.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: This has done a wonderful job keeping my skin clear
customer_reviews.text: This has done a wonderful job keeping my skin clear, clean and smooth. I typically have iffy skin that sometimes likes some products and sometimes doesn't so I took a gamble ordering this and I haven't been disappointed. It helps with my nose blackheads too which is a super plus! I will definitely reorder when needed. This has been a great addition to my skincare routine.
customer_reviews.author: Renata Andrejszky

customer_reviews.title: Works, but maybe more than it should.
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to receive this product, because I have had dry patches on my face lately with the weather changing. It came on time, and I was happy with the packaging and the look of the overall product. I put it on, and it worked just like the instructions said it would. It made my skin feel really soft and hydrated once I removed it. However, the next day I kind of broke out on my forehead and chin, and I know it was a direct cause of the mask because I very rarely get pimples anymore. Besides that, however, I do like this product, but I wouldn't recommend it to anyone that is prone to breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Campbell

customer_reviews.title: LOOOOOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin and always had acne...at least since I was 11 years old. This product is absolutely amazing and is incredibly gentle on my skin. It smells good, applies easily and really does do a wonderful job of minimizing pores, removing redness and keeping my skin soft. I really do highly recommend this, especially for people who have had trouble with being sensitive to skin products.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Just started using. It said once a week. But I've been using twice a week. I have oily acne prone skin but it has reduced the oil. I use a vitamin c serum after and tea tree face cream. I've seen an improvement in my skin. I'm trying to get to clear skin without medication and I think I may have found my skin care regimen. After using the mask my face feels like velvet. No clogged pores and less oil production. Love it. You don't need much so I think this will last for awhile. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: have gotten drastically better. My face feels and looks smoother
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin, and have to be careful with the products I use. The first time I used this, my face was slightly red the next day, but that is normal when I use a new product. After the initial redness went away, my face did look much cleaner and felt very smooth. I have followed the instructions about using it weekly since I purchased it. Since then, the areas of my face where I usually start to break out, have gotten drastically better. My face feels and looks smoother, and I feel like my skin looks healthier. You don't need to use much of this mud mask, so it will last for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: sitinurefinnej

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My friends and I had a girls night and one of them brought this over. I had to order it because I loved how it made my face feel after. I’ve been using it once a week ever since and even my husband has noticed a difference in my skin. I get compliments “your face looks radiant” and by my boo “your skin is so smooth.” Love it. Will definitely buy again when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't use this for pimples anymore. Whenever I get a bug bite on any part of my body (mostly my face or arms) I rub a little of the mask onto the area and wait for about 15-20 minutes. Usually by then I see tiny clear liquid come out from that area and viola the bug bite is no longer noticeable or itchy! I have a huge problem with mosquitos. Surprisingly the Dead Sea Mud Mask makes them bearable! I mean it does say the Dead Sea's Mud has healing properties right?
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany J

customer_reviews.title: I'm a dude and I use it.
customer_reviews.text: I get the occasional pimple and sometimes I want to squeeze a black head so it damages the surrounding skin. Usually bruised or flaky skin around it, so I use this and when I take a shower all those problems rinse away. I am 26 and most people say I look 22. For a year this is the only thing I've been using. As a guy I don't care much for face washes and whatever else other people do on a daily routine. Works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan S.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE It! Favorite face mask so far!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially put off by the price of this as I normally dont spend that much on a single face product but a little goes a long way with this so It lasts awhile. Very thick definitely makes you appear to be a creature from the dead sea for 20 minutes or so. Takes some time to rinse thoroughly enough to completely remove but makes your face feel just wonderful afterwards. Cleansed purified and rejuvenated. Face seriously appears cleaner too. Even has a light natural scent to It thats nice. That definitely helps keep something on your face for that long. Would definitely buy this all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Just Niki

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this. I really
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. I really, really, really did. Unfortunately, with my skin type, it breaks me out every single time I use it. I feel like it has a nice smell, it definitely makes my skin super smooth after it's washed off, but it just didn't work for me. I had to give it one star, but it might work for you.
customer_reviews.author: N. Greggo

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: I have a nerve condition that makes using some of these types of products hard on me. Some can cause more pain. This one has been great though. It doesn't trigger any nerve pain. Leaves my face smooth, soft and moisturized. I have noticed a decrease in black heads and pimples. It says to use once a week and as such makes a great price as it will last me awhile... I am very very happy with this product. I recommend it for anyone and especially for those, like me, who suffer from bilateral atypical trigeminal neuralgia and occipital neuralgia.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Another product that takes a few applications to get used to. However, this will make your face feel smoother than a new born baby's cheeks. Your face will tingle with delicious moisture and faintly smell like your favorite dog. I like to wash my hair, then let the mask sit. When I wash the mask off, it will turn my bath water grey, but I enjoy sitting in it and letting my skin soak in the moisture. Just be sure to wash your hair and rinse before removing the mask or your hair will be flat all day.
customer_reviews.author: Alexi

customer_reviews.title: This mud mask smells amazing my roommate and I have both used it and ...
customer_reviews.text: This mud mask smells amazing my roommate and I have both used it and both noticed how hydrated and refreshed our faces feel after we used it. I would recommend applying with your fingers just so it gets exactly where you want it on your face. My roommate and I have applied this mask twice both full face and it doesn't even look like a dent has been made in the amount of product.
customer_reviews.author: L P

customer_reviews.title: Clears up acne!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the mask for a few months now, at first I thought it was okay. BUT, now I think it’s amazing, I switched birth control and my skin went crazy with acne. I can put on the mask and literally see my acne shrinking and fluid coming out of my problem spots!!! I tried to take pictures but it just didn’t look good, lol. Highly recommend this mask!!
customer_reviews.author: LaurenB23

customer_reviews.title: Misleading ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product, but when I went to reorder my next bottle the ingredients had changed to potato and corn starch rather than the more truly natural mud mask. This is not as friendly for sensitive skin anymore.. beware! They don't allow returns either!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin R Collom

customer_reviews.title: I am always skeptical when trying a new mask but this one really did make my skin feel amazing to touch
customer_reviews.text: This mask makes me skin SO soft. And a little goes a long way so I expect this to last me quite awhile and to be worth the price entirely. I am always skeptical when trying a new mask but this one really did make my skin feel amazing to touch. I will probably buy again whenever I eventually run out. Oh also, it doesnt burn or sting me at all and I have sensitive skin that is sometimes irritated by masks. So, for my sensitive combination skin this was great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lemons

customer_reviews.title: They love my skin
customer_reviews.text: Never had a mask that cleanses so deep! I work outdoors and between the dirt, sweat and sun, my face aches for a some TLC! I use this bad boy once a week followed by witch hazel and an oil based moisturizer. I do get a lot of compliments on my skin as i am almost 40 with no signs of wrinkles yet. Ladies, add this to your nightly regiment. You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Leka

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and get this!
customer_reviews.text: This is "The Best." I've told all my friends about this product. This is a staple part of my skincare routine; if you are having any issues with your skin (acne, dryness, dullness, large pores) this is the product to buy. Make sure to let it dry completely on my skin to have to preform its complete magic. I've tried other popular mudmasks from Amazon, and this one is my absolute favorite. This is my de-stress product on a Sunday night to get ready for the week, and it makes my skin look much better for the busy workweek.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Appelman

customer_reviews.title: i think it's good
customer_reviews.text: I got this product in 2days so i was excited about that.so first off in picky about what i put on my face cause i tend to get really dry in the face when i try something new.but i have tried this and i like it so far didn't leave my face with that dry feeling or redness after i rinsed it off.Still need to give this product a few more uses to see how it really affects my skin that's the reason for the 4⭐,but so far so good.This was a good buy for me hope it will be for you.&i have to buy my mom one now😊😀.
customer_reviews.author: HdyGrL⚠

customer_reviews.title: BABY SMOOTH SKIN!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mask! After I use it, my forehead feels like a baby’s butt- it’s ridiculous! Not exaggerating!! Leaves your skin super soft and helps get dirt out of larger pores (especially around nose area). I use it around once a week and have purchased this multiple times. Great price! As always with skincare, I recommend spot testing on your skin to make sure it doesn’t irritate you before applying for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Maroon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I Really enjoy this product! I used it almost every week. I bought this because I noticed I was breaking out a lot lately and so I started trying to find a solution for it. I've never had problems with acne so i didn't know where to start. I bought a couple of products (oils, exfoliators, etc) and this product seems to be working the best out of all of them. I've used it for probably 10 weeks already and I see a huge improvement in my skin. It's really a great product and will last a LONG time. Ive used it a lot and so has my mom and I'm not even close to halfway done with the container.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: BEST MASK FOR CLEARING ACNE SKIN
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. I had such bad acne covering my cheeks chin and neck and with 4 times of using this mask(every other day) its cleared my skin dramatically and took away all redness and now just have a few small bumps but I am very pleased. better and quicker working that glam glow clearing mud and the Aztec clay mask. this mask beats those two without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Dea sea scrub
customer_reviews.text: Ok when I first got this product I thought it was a bit small, however after using it, this product does not disappoint. The texture comes on so smooth and creamy it is unlike any mud mask or any mask for that matter that I have ever used, and the amount needed is such a small amount that this product will last for quite some time. I love it and I highly recommend this mask for anyone that does their own facials. Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Kailene

customer_reviews.title: It makes my face feel like any other mud mask that I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this mud mask because it was an Amazon Choice product. It makes my face feel like any other mud mask that I have tried. There is really nothing special about it. I do like the natural ingredients and the smell of the mask. The end result is a softer face which is great but I was expecting a little more for the price I paid. I also thought there was going to be more product inside because it wasn't filled up to the top. I will be keeping this regardless because it is still a good mask.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: not natural
customer_reviews.text: i doubt if there is more than 10% of dead sea mud in this product. the list of ingredients on the jar is really long and most of them aren't natural. the smell is very chemical, not something that is easy to smell during 15-20 minutes while you have this mask on your face. moreover, there are no returns allowed for this product! the seller ships you crap, and you have to accept it.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Nothing dramatic but works fine & doesn't irritate my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easily which is a big bonus for me. I also have a bentonite clay mask but that takes too long & is messy & I'm lazy, so...lol. This is not a powerful feeling detox mask, it feel more lightly purify, which I like sometimes because I have very sensitive skin & it can get easily irritated by the strong stuff. I don't know if I would purchase again, this container has lasted me a year & it's still got a good amount, so I probably would buy it again, not sure. But it is worth a try & is not a big dive in the wallet, so hey.
customer_reviews.author: Yodit

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: If you have sensitive skin be careful. It irritates my skin and makes me breakout. Ive tried to use it several times and its too potent for me.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: YAAAAAAAAAS!
customer_reviews.text: Can not say enough good things about this mask. My skin is very sensitive and goes absolutely crazy once a month. This mask has been quite the life saver. It dries out my acne super quickly. Results are close to immediate. I also dab onto random pimples that pop up amd they are dried up by morning
customer_reviews.author: SugarBoss

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and detoxifying - great after a flight
customer_reviews.text: So soothing! This is my go-to if my skin is freaking out. I use it after a hot shower when my face is dry but still warm and pores are open. Especially good after air travel to remove impurities without losing moisture.
customer_reviews.author: quietbubble

customer_reviews.title: Tightens and cleans pores
customer_reviews.text: As someone with large pores and oily skin, I am always looking for a product that will help me minimize the appearance of my pores and control my oil. I think this product has helped so far. After putting it on, I leave it on for about 20 minutes and wash it off. Afterward my skin feels tighter and cleaner. As the product specifies, do not use it too often. At most I use the mask 2x a week. The mask does what it says and it's natural too!
customer_reviews.author: C. Luis

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, won't buy again though
customer_reviews.text: I like that it helps to clear my face, however it leaves it very dry afterwards. That must be the reason it says not to use it more than once per week. Reading the ingredients makes me question exactly why they call this 'dead sea' mud mask when I see nothing here that indicates the region the ingredients are from (usually, there is an indicator for the higher content of ingredients found in the dead sea).
customer_reviews.author: LZuk

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: My skin gets red and irritated very easily, and this is one of the few masks I've found that doesn't burn my skin. It is fun to use, neutral smelling, and did seem to even the tone of my skin, although the effects were short-lived.
customer_reviews.author: Maps

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff this is why
customer_reviews.text: It actually calms my skin. Does not give me any irritation does not give me any redness. When it dries it does crack. So you know when it’s dry.Face feels so clean afterwards it really does detox you.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Used on our normal and oily skin. Great results
customer_reviews.text: The smell is light and pleasant as well as pervasive. I have normal skin and it helped with a few whiteheads and left my skin soft and moisturized. I also used this on my SO who has slightly oilier skin. This cleaned up his pores nicely and left his skin soft. I also used this on his back which is not so great looking. After I rinsed it off we both noticed an immediate improvent! His skin was softer and cleaner and his pores were...ejecting their contents so his back looked clearer. We did not suffer any allergic reactions and found the results to be superb.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! I just got it, so I can't say anything about long term results. But after just one use my skin was noticeably softer! I used it at night in the bath and washed it off and went straight to bed without putting any moisturizer on like I usually do. I woke up and my skin was still incredibly soft and moisturized (which is saying a lot because I am from South Dakota and after the winter months my skin is always dry to the point it starts to crack/peel). I will update this review when I have used the product longer and see some long term results.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Thick and rich!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really a mask person, but the positive reviews for this product influenced me to give it a chance. My first impression of it was on rich and dark the mask was! I've used other mud masks that felt more watery than substantial, but that wasn't the case with this one. Even just a few fingertips of mud covers the whole face. While you can feel it tighten, it doesn't render your face immobile or feel like there's any kind of gooey-ness happening. Recommended for anyone who wants to try a new kind of mask.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long & works well!
customer_reviews.text: This delivers! I use once a week as directed. I apply a thin layer after washing my face, let it dry and gently rub off all the dead skin and impurities it removes. Spreads easily to sightly damp face. Helped reduce blackheads and hormone induced acne breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lo

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves this mud mask
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this stuff. She usually waits for sales on beauty products, but refills this stuff whenever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chanh

customer_reviews.title: Mud sold on AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: This MUD came in & I used it, wasn't bad but then realized that it had EXPIRED! Wake up AMAZON! This is just wrong!
customer_reviews.author: christina bonaros

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS MASK
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS MASK! My skin was glowing after I washed it off although my pores weren't visibly smaller, my skin was baby soft and felt so clean and refreshed! Just note, this mask does tighten as it dries, like A LOT, so just be aware of that and avoid your mouth and eye area. There is a mild earthy smell but nothing bothersome, offensive, or overpowering. Also, a little goes a long way so there is no need to cake this product on, it does the job with a thin to medium layer. Directions say to only use it once a week and no more than that. I followed up with Pro-Active Toner and Repairing Lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Bizzie Bee

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice, leaves skin soft and even.
customer_reviews.text: This mask smells very pleasant. I'm not sure if it has any skin-clearing power, but after using it my skin feels soft and refreshed. I have sensitive and breakout-prone skin and have not had any negative experiences with this product. If anything, my skin is less red after using this mask (which is pretty impressive for my skin!). Also, a little goes a long way - the consistency is smooth and almost oily, yet it rinses clean. I will probably repurchase once this runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E.

customer_reviews.title: I love this mask!
customer_reviews.text: First off, this smells AMAZING. The consistency is very buttery, and it goes on smooth. I left it on my face for the recommended 15 minutes and afterwards my skin felt smooth, the dry spots were soft, and the oily spots were dried out (in a good way). I am very happy with this purchase and I can't wait to use it again!
customer_reviews.author: Halo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am usually wary about trying any face mask products. The ones I have used in the past left my face feeling rough. When I opened the bottle, was pleasantly surprised by the smell. Tried a little of the product on my neck and kept it for 20 mins to ensure no allergic reaction. After ensuring everything went well, applied a thin layer with a brush on my face and let it on for 30 mins. Rinsed it off as per instructions with warm water. It left my face looking clean and soft. Will apply again after a week.
customer_reviews.author: MasterChief78

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Expired Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product came more than a year expired. Manufactured 3/2017, Expired 3/2019. It is now 4/2020. It is a non-refundable item so this is kind of rediculous. Date isn't even close!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this to those who have problems with blackheads and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mask 1-2 week for about 3 months. I still have 3/4 of the jar full because a little goes a long way. It has really helped with my blackheads and reducing acne scars. I highly recommend this to those who have problems with blackheads and scarring but also have sensitive skin. This is the only mask that doesn't irritate my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli B

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of all the positive reviews I read about it. This product did nothing for me when I compared it to the aztec indian clay mask, which is much better because I own them both. Always looking for the best products for my face and this one missed the mark.
customer_reviews.author: Beline

customer_reviews.title: ... in the past but nothing prepared me for this wonderful treat! This stuff is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've used mud masks in the past but nothing prepared me for this wonderful treat! This stuff is amazing! Like exceeded my expectations. And the best part was after rinsing my skin it wasn't dry like it usually is after using a clay mask. I'm actually considering giving this and a few other Pure Body Natural products to my mom for Christmas since they seem to be such a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Buckleymomma

customer_reviews.title: I didn't get paid for this review
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about some of the negative reviews and so I didn't purchase this item for a while. I finally gave in and purchased it and I was so happy with it! The consistency, the way it dried, the way my skin felt afterwards was amazing! I didn't get paid to write this review so trust me when I say it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Roya Shan

customer_reviews.title: It's a little hard to even believe but my breakout haven't been near as often and I feel like the scarring has decreased
customer_reviews.text: I've had acne for years and have scarring from it. I have been prescribed just about every pill and cream there is. As I have gotten older it has settled but I get small breakouts often but after using this mask I've noticed a difference.. It's a little hard to even believe but my breakout haven't been near as often and I feel like the scarring has decreased . It's no over night miricale.. I can't say there even is one, but I do recommend trying it! I feel like it has helped my skin a lot. Good product and it will last me a while.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff. I have been amazed at how my skin has responded to it. I use it once a week before bed as part of my face care routine and it has made a huge difference. My pores are clearer and smaller, my skin tone more even, and my skin looks brighter. I feel like it's a lot of porduct for the price, especially since I'm only using it weekly. My husband has used it a few times as well and likes it too. If you're on the fence, get it.
customer_reviews.author: kray

customer_reviews.title: Should be actually 2.5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Applied it several times now to my face. It actually makes no difference. It has a SHORT time effect (for few hours) that the skin feels softer but the visible evidence of nicer skin is equal cero. At least it doesn't harm my skin. That's why I give the product 2.5 stars. Honestly, you can just save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Wallis

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much
customer_reviews.text: Holy hell - Order it - order the small one if you arent sure what kind of skin you have but I'll be ordering much more because after just one frigin use it made my face so effing soft, its insane I can't stop touching it, i HAD to review this product. I love it so much. just to clarify, I've never had major acne, My pores also din't seem to be big and I probably don have oily skin,
customer_reviews.author: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works miracles! Ok, that was an exaggeration, but honestly it does work well to help clear and balance your skin. Especially when used as a spot treatment. When you feel a pimple coming just put a dab of this on it and let sit for 20-30 minutes and it won't even appear. It can be drying so if you plan on using this as a full face mask then I'd recommend only once a week and follow with a light moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great working mask
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. It really gets deep down into the pores it feels like abs helps clear my acne when I have bad break outs. I have semi sensitive skin and it’s fine for me but not sure how it would be with really sensitive skin. And the product is a little thick so you have to really spread it out when you put it on, but it’s so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: “Doesn’t remove my blackheads on my nose”
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product once a week, for a month or so now. Nothing’s changed. The only difference is; it made my face rough and “clean”. You know, the feeling of oil being stripped off your skin. I hardly get pimples from it, but it did forced out one (but it was a small one). I used to have acne (my face doesn’t have any acne scars except dark spots), and it hardly trigger irritation 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Reileen

customer_reviews.title: Works Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a month now and my skin is much softer. I've not noticed where it my pores are smaller, but maybe that takes a little more time. I use another product for what acne flair ups I do have, so I can't say that it's worked for me in that area, but I will say again that it makes my skin soft. I love that the consistency is thick but it's gentle and has a nice scent to it. I only use once a week. Overall not a bad choice. Good price for the amount that you get.
customer_reviews.author: M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and I saw some other reviews of people that have had burns or breakouts, rashes from using this product. I didn't experience any of that. Like any skin product, you're not going to have the same effect or reaction because everyone is different. It works for some, and for others, it doesn't agree with their skin. It went on really smooth, it felt nice when it was on. I washed it off in the shower. It left my face feeling nice and my pores tight. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin & Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great of oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I can see myself amending this review to 5-stars after I can see how it works long term. But for now, it is great! I have VERY oily skin. The kind of skin that is a blinding oil slick by 10 am no matter what kinds of toners, primers, powders, etc I try. I've found that using this first thing in the morning and then moisturizing balances my face out great! If you think I'm exaggerating about how oily my face is... the instruction son this mask say do not use more than once a week... I've been using is DAILY and my skin isn't dried out at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good mud mask
customer_reviews.text: I have had acne problems for as long as I can remember. I had been thinkin about getting a mud mask for a while and I read the reviews of a few until I finally decided to purchase this one. I think it's better than the reviews described, it dries out my worst pimples while it doesn't completely dry out my skin so I can use it all over my face. I really enjoy using it once a week to keep my skin under control, not perfect but definitely helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very thick mask. It also lasts a very long time. Definitely worth the small price you pay. I use this once a week religiously. It has helped with dark spots due to acne, and helped with redness and my deep looking pores. My skin always feels soft, and I can go without make up now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla C.

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what’s in this mask but omg! My face was beyond cleaned and soft! My skin glows. My face seems fuller and more plump! My acne scars are almost non existence! I cannot wait to use this again. Package does state to use once weekly. I’m truly amazed by this product. I’ve never used anything like this in the past!
customer_reviews.author: Pcp616

customer_reviews.title: Good product, nice feel
customer_reviews.text: I'm sensitive to smells as I suffer from headaches and migraines. I love this product though. I do use it once a week, occasionally twice a week if I feel my skin needs a little extra clarity. It hasn't taken my blackheads away per se, but it has brightened up my dull skin and it feels really good. It's a nice thing to do for yourself after a long week at work while you enjoy a glass of wine while you chill out at home. The likelihood that I will purchase this product again is highly favorable.
customer_reviews.author: The Cold One

customer_reviews.title: I am so beyond glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive combination skin, so I was a bit hesitant to try this. However, I am so beyond glad that I did. The product was easy to put on and felt great as it started to dry. I washed it off with warm water and a microfiber cloth when I got into the shower and my skin has never felt so good! The only part that made me feel a bit sad was reading the directions and it advises to not use it more than once a week. Man, I could see myselg using this every night if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, for the price I did not expect much but there is a definite glow and a definite smoothness to my skin after using just one time. It does not dry like some other masks, and you wash it off, you don't peel it off. It might not "feel" like it's doing anything--but it's doing something!
customer_reviews.author: Yet another Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: It made my skin allergic terribly. It took me awhile to recover from the damage caused by this product and my skin is not the sensitive at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P.

customer_reviews.title: Changed the ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product multiple times. I was about to reorder and saw the ingredients changed! Trying something new that does not have potato cornstarch as the first ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: TLW

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your skin feeling like a baby's soft smooth skin
customer_reviews.text: I got this mask after getting tired from having to mix a dry clay mask. The feel of my face after it is applied and washed off, is like that of a baby skin. I wish i could use it more than once a week. At times, I am very consistent with the use and other times not. I look at this as a natural face regime but i must say that when i was faithful with it pimples did not stand a chance of appearing on my face. I also feel my face very clean after its use, even much cleaner than when i wash my face with facial wash.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! I bought it because of the positive reviews & the reviews were right. I used it on my whole face the first time & i could see the changes right away in my pores, and that is saying a lot because all the other masks I used never affected the size of my pores, ever!!! Even though the instructions said to use once a week, I put some on my nose & the area around it because I have rosacea. This morning I was hapoy to see my nose was less red! Plus a little of this goes a lonnngg way!
customer_reviews.author: Trench worker

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from dry skin. I wash with good cleansers and moisturizers but they are never enough. When I say dry skin I mean I will get flakes of skin right after I apply makeup. I've tried many products but this stuff has actually helped. Even though I could use it more often I only use it once every couple of weeks and I get great results. I've been using it for the last few months. Also I have sensitive skin but this does not bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Movie lover

customer_reviews.title: Must try this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this after ready the reviews. My daughter, grandson, and I loved the way our skin felt after using this. Tired of paying high prices for Mary Kay, Avon, Estée Lauder, and Clinique products with all those unknown ingredients. This product did just as well as the high end stuff. I'm a former Mary Kay consultant and even with my discount I prefer using natural products.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Walker

customer_reviews.title: Product is expired
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered this mask and I love it. This one arrived expired very dissatisfied and disappointed that the mask can not be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: This was my first mask so not anything to compare to but I really like it. My stepdaughter turned me on to it and I’ve been using it for many months now. My skin feels great after I use it. I recommend giving it a try especially as a first time product. I don’t know if it’s cruelty free and will look into that before ordering again as I’m making that change.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Dyslin

customer_reviews.title: Don't use if you have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: So sad this didn't work for me :/ I put this mask on and within 2 minutes it started burning really had had to wash it off . I guess my skin is really sensitive. Do not use if you have very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me, fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: I like this mask alot! Felt like it gave my skin alot of moisture without breaking me out in the oily places, you get a ton and use very little so it will last and you can have fun using it with friends. It's very gentle and good for all skin types. Ill even put a couple dots of it on my daughters face when she sees me using it which is about once a week. Easy to apply and easy to remove with warm water. This product works for me and is fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: All around skin health!
customer_reviews.text: I like the results and feeling after using this product, highly recommend for all who suffer from eczema! So far this has been my most effective way to fight eczema from the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Sir N8

customer_reviews.title: Big, detoxified thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Ahhhh-mazing stuff. I've used many different muds over decades and this stuff rocks. It does everything as advertised, and must be the best mud mask I've ever used. It doesn't just draw, but soothes and calms, which I need. I read it is medical-grade, but am not sure I fully understood the importance of this statement or usage! It really makes a difference (after being used to just cosmetics-grade stuff—even the expensive brands I tend toward!).
customer_reviews.author: sid v

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I don't have acne prone skin, but I do have large pores and acne scars. My skin did feel softer after use, but the mask, for some reason, gave me more acne than before--the ones with white heads. It also caused redness for me. Despite the good reviews, the product is not for everyone. I have Asian skin, if anyone was wondering.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask
customer_reviews.text: Compare to other mask i have used this one so far is my favourite i love the way it leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth. I have sensitive combination skin so i was a bit worried at first that it might cause irritation to my skin but very happ and please with the results so far. I let it dry for about 10 to 15 min or so but everyone should use base on their desire also seemlike it will ladt me for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

product_meta.title: Pure Body Naturals Dead Sea Mud Mask for Face and Body, Purifying Face Mask for Acne, Blackheads, and Oily Skin, 8.8 Ounce
feature_bullets: WORLD FAMOUS MUD MASK. Featured by Marie Claire, Elle, Entertainment Tonight, CNN.
FIGHTS ACNE, BLACKHEADS, AND OILY SKIN. This mineral-rich mask detoxes and removes buildup.
MADE WITH DEAD SEA MUD. Used for centuries. Proven antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory properties.
PART OF A WEEKLY SELF-CARE ROUTINE. Incorporate into your skincare regimen for clear, healthy skin.
FREE FROM NASTY CHEMICALS. No BPA, Phthalates, or other endocrine disruptors. Made in the USA.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
